text: Wonder Woman 1984 star Gal Gadot took a break from filming to make a surprise children's hospital visit. Gadot is currently working on the sequel to last year's wildly successful Wonder Woman around Virginia with director Patty Jenkins and co - star Chris Pine. Production on the sequel started at the beginning of last month and DC fans have spotted Gadot as well as her co - stars around town filming at a mall and some street fighting scenes too. To say that Gadot is busy would be a massive understatement. Even with her busy filming schedule for Wonder Woman 1984, Gal Gadot made time to surprise the staff and children at Inova's Children's Hospital in Falls Church, Virginia.
